name: 2022 11th International Conference on Computing and Pattern Recognition
content: Publication&Indexing: 1\. Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9705-6): archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, reviewed by CPCI. 2\. International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing (IJMLC) (ISSN: 2010-3700): indexed by Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, etc.
